10 = b>b10000 _20 20 = b>b100000 _20 100 = b>b100000000 _20 25 = b>b100101 _20 2aa = b>b1010101010
b.3 = b>b1011.0011 _20 1f.f8 = b>b11111.11111 _20 a.5 = b>b1010.0101 _20 11.11 = b>b10001.00010001 _20

10 / 13 = b>b10000/10011 _16 8 / 1 = b>b100/1 _16 9 / a = b>b1001/1010 _16 5 / 7 = b>b0101/0111 _16 1 / 3 = b>b1/11
